Class I2CChannel

java.lang.Object
  I2CChannel

public class I2CChannel
extends java.lang.Object

I2CChannel.java - This channel allows access to an I2c channel using FTDI USB-I2c converter.

Revision History:

  • March 14, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Fixed the read method.
    • command returns a boolean reporting success.
    • Command now takes a sleep parameter to make threads wait a certain amount of time after a command is issued.
  • March 13, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Compiled.
    • I had to remove a parenthesis.
    • Added method to read bytes.
  • March 12, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Wrote; did not even test.
    • Created comments.
  • ???, ???
    • Someone made this, right?

Field Detail

channel

public gnu.io.SerialPort channel
The com port that represents the I2c channel. It is not used much except to find the outputstream and input stream. It might be removable as a class variable at a later time unless it is needed for cleanup

outpkt

public byte[] outpkt
The output buffer to the I2c channel. This is where commands go to the outside world.

inpkt

public byte[] inpkt
The input buffer from the I2c channel. This is where information read from the input stream goes before being converted to some useful form

out

public java.io.OutputStream out
The I2c channel output stream.

in

public java.io.InputStream in
The I2c channel input stream.

Constructor Detail

I2CChannel

public I2CChannel(java.lang.String comPort)
           throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor. It constructs an I2CChannel object from the comport given as a parameter.

Parameters:
comPort - The comPort the usb-i2c converter uses.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

i2cCommand

public boolean i2cCommand(byte address,
                          byte register,
                          byte cmd,
                          int sleep)
sends a command to a device. It does not expect to receive a return value, so it can be easily ran in a seperate thread to reduce blocking. This might need to be changed to issue multi-byte commands in the future, but that will not be hard.

Parameters:
address - The address of the I2C device to command.
register - The register receiving the command.
cmd - The command that will be executed.
sleep - How long to sleep afterwards.
Returns:
Whether the command sent correctly or not.

i2cReadLong

public long i2cReadLong(byte address,
                        byte register)
Reads a long from a device. It simply asks for a long.

Parameters:
address - The address of the I2C device to command.
register - The register receiving the command.
Returns:
The long that was taken off the inbound buffer.

i2cReadByte

public byte i2cReadByte(byte address,
                        byte register)
Reads a byte from a device. It simply asks for a byte.

Parameters:
address - The address of the I2C device to command.
register - The register receiving the command.
Returns:
The byte that was taken off the inbound buffer.
